input.sentences: many rides went around the park
output.sentences: The best way to start the day at the amusement park is on a ride.
It is nice to be able to take a break in the shade when you need a breather.
If your feet get tired you can ride the tram across the park and see the attractions from above.
The kids will love the splash pad as the temperature of the day heat up.
There is nothing more fun then taking a stroll the dinosaur land at the end of a long day.
